title: Red Meat Abattoir Association welcomes meat inspections at abattoirs
content: 8:36 pm Categorised in: Breaking News  [embedded content]    The Red Meat Abattoir Association has welcomed independent meat inspections at abattoirs. The Meat Inspection Scheme, promulgated last year is now in the implementation phase . The North West Red Meat Producers ’ Association has assured consumers that any disease outbreaks at abattoirs can be individually detected and confirmed. This emerged at the Association’s annual conference in Klerksdorp.    For more news, visit: sabcnews.com
